about_the_game:
Welcome to our sci-fi space adventure, where players take on the roles of a crew aboard a spaceship as they work together to survive in the vast and dangerous universe. With the ability to play as the captain, engineer, botanist, or scientist, players can choose their own path and adventure. However, with the multitude of ways to die in space, players must also be prepared to face the challenges and dangers that come with exploring the unknown. The game features randomly generated universes and round-based game play, adding to the unpredictability and excitement. The ultimate goal is to reach the end destination, but the game can also end when the entire crew perishes or the ship is destroyed. Join the crew and see if you have what it takes to survive in the vast expanse of space.


The game is in early Beta right now and in active development, anything and everything is privy to change.

Current Features:
- Randomly generated universe
- Jump around star systems and find your way home
- Mine asteroids for resources such as fuel
- Scan sick or injured crew members in the med bay med pods to heal them
- Call the emergency escape shuttle in case of total system failure
- Patch hull breaches in order to not die.. in space
- Manage energy consumption round the ship
- EVAC to mine asteroids or patch hull breaches from the outside

name: Don't die in space!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

short_description: Welcome to our sci-fi space adventure, where players take on the roles of a crew aboard a spaceship as they work together to survive in the vast and dangerous universe.
